puzzle: DXTFGFZ SW USZWI SK IXF USFJQ PKQ PDPSIW IXF ATOSKR TU IXF FKFOV, DSJJ EF UZFWX UTZ IXF USRXI; DXTFGFZ SW WFATKQ SK IXF USFJQ PKQ XPW IT XPWIFK IT EPIIJF DSJJ PZZSGF FHXPNWIFQ. IXFZFUTZF IXF AJFGFZ ATOEPIPKI SOMTWFW XSW DSJJ TK IXF FKFOV, ENI QTFW KTI PJJTD IXF FKFOV'W DSJJ IT EF SOMTWFQ TK XSO.
solution: WHOEVER IS FIRST IN THE FIELD AND AWAITS THE COMING OF THE ENEMY, WILL BE FRESH FOR THE FIGHT; WHOEVER IS SECOND IN THE FIELD AND HAS TO HASTEN TO BATTLE WILL ARRIVE EXHAUSTED. THEREFORE THE CLEVER COMBATANT IMPOSES HIS WILL ON THE ENEMY, BUT DOES NOT ALLOW THE ENEMY'S WILL TO BE IMPOSED ON HIM.
